meta.purpose: Chaos-mode proof concept scaffold for P vs NP using interacting lemma graph, audits, locality, and monotone extraction.

interaction_rules.detail: All JSON nodes reference 'file#ChunkX' anchors matching the .txt progression.
When a lemma status changes, update attack_graph.edges impact and storyboard stage gating.
Any attempted proof should land in a .txt chunk; JSON stores only structured summary and blockers.
All probabilistic bounds are stored in lemma_bank with explicit parameters; avoid silent assumptions.

current_plan.next_attack: Attempt L_locality in a concrete sparse-CNF distribution using disjoint-union + renaming invariance.
current_plan.auxiliary_attack: Design a compositional reduction R where conjunction of disjoint var-sets corresponds to graph union/product.
